show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
What’s News With You? Give Your Take On Open Forum! <!--more--> Share your thoughts, opinions, ideas and analyses of issues and events you deem newsworthy.
It’s Open Forum on Leid Stories – which means you decide where and how the discussion ought to go.
But be warned: Very savvy people will be listening to you, expecting keen insight and a command of your subject matter.
They will show you no mercy if you come up short.
(Actually, that’s an exaggeration – the “no mercy” business — but it’s meant to encourage you to do your best.) Call in and share your considered opinion, and experience for yourself the reaction to your interaction!
